sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Text, Anchor } from 'grommet';

const ListItem = ({ item, removeItem }) => {
  return (
    <Box 
      background="accent-4" 
      justify="around"
      align="center"
      round="large" 
      height="27%" 
      width="70%" 
      pad="small"
    >
      <Box>
        <Text 
          margin={{bottom: "xsmall"}} 
          textAlign="center" 
          weight="bold"
        >
          {item.name}
        </Text>
        <Box direction="row" justify="center" gap="medium" width="100%">
          <Text size="small">{item.categories[0].title}</Text>
          <Text size="small">{(item.distance / 1000).toFixed(1)} kms</Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box 
        direction="row" 
        justify="center" 
        gap="large" 
        width="100%"
      >
          <Box 
            background={{ "color": "dark-1", "opacity": "weak"}}
            round="large" 
            width="66px" 
            pad="small" 
          >
            <Anchor 
              alignSelf="center" 
              href={item.url} 
              color="dark-1" 
              size="small" 
              label="Info" 
              primary 
            />
          </Box>
          <Box 
            background={{ "color": "status-warning", "opacity": "strong"}}
            round="large" 
            width="66px" 
            pad="small" 
          >
            <Anchor 
              onClick={() => removeItem()} 
              alignSelf="center" 
              label="Delete" 
              color="dark-1" 
              size="small" 
            />
          </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default ListItem;
